about_the_game:
Take to the skies as the hero of Earth to repel invading enemy forces in Sky Blitz! 

Sky Blitz is a 2D Pixel Art Side Scroller Action game where your objective is to fly a jet and destroy everything in your way to ensure the safety of earth and beyond!

The Ultimate goal of Sky Blitz is to replicate the experience you had as a child playing on a Arcade Machine. With multiple worlds to conquer while unlocking skins, powerful weapons and items with special abilities you will never have a dull moment in Sky Blitz and when you think you are done you can keep playing over and over again to earn Gems and Solar Orbs along the way and never get bored due to the random enemy pattern spawn system.. This also applies to the Player Power Up Boxes!

Happy hunting out there!

name: Sky Blitz

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 (64-bit version of OS is required)
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz or more
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Sky Blitz is a 2D Pixel Art Side Scroller Action game where your objective as the hero of Earth is to fly your jet and destroy everything in your way to ensure the safety of your home planet and beyond!
